name: TheMinager
description:
Gather gems at the mine, and sell them on the market.

Click TO THE MINE ! to start.

And don't forget to improve your trolley ! (but don't try to finish the game, the max improvement price is sadly broken...)

CONTROLS ARROWSMove trolley
MSBClick buttons

Everything (graphics, music, code) was created in 3h30 for the Trijam-81 with the theme Mining.
